cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2004 Toyota Corolla with only 190,000 miles on it. Standard transmission, CD and cassette player.
This is a classic car with only 85000 miles on it. 5.0 Litre engine, 3-on-the-floor.
